title: The Lord of Losers
overview: Hu Qiang, an honest man who has worked at the grassroots level of the company for ten years, suddenly got a "promotion" opportunity and was transferred to a small department called "Department of Disruption" as a manager. His subordinates are all wonderful, thorny programmer Ouyang Mofei, chicken blood sales Tang Haixing, gossip secretary Jin Ruoyu, rigid designer Su Kejie, fragile copywriter Pang Xiaobai, Erlengzi intern Sha Lele, the only thing they have in common is that everyone is a loser . Others work for 8 hours, they work for hours, they have endless things to do every day, and they can eat enough just by suffering. But even so, this group of salted fish grievances did not intend to lie down. They tried their best to save their work and life, and staged one hilarious story after another.
